message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm offering it to you at the special price of $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $8,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway â€“ how about $10,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $9,000?
